name: generate_funnel_chart
description: Generate a funnel chart to visualize the progressive reduction of data as it passes through stages, such as, the conversion rates of users from visiting a website to completing a purchase.

category.description: Stage category name, such as '浏览网站'.

value.description: Value at this stage, such as 50000.

data.description: Data for funnel chart, such as, [{ category: '浏览网站', value: 50000 }, { category: '放入购物车', value: 35000 }, { category: '生成订单', value: 25000 }].

height.description: Set the height of the chart, default is 600px.

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

title.description: Set the title of the chart.

width.description: Set the width of the chart, default is 800px.
